items.title: OpenAI 政策高管因反对“成人模式”被曝遭解雇
items.contentSnippet: The executive has denied the allegation that she engaged in discrimination.
items.whyItMatters: 内部冲突：OpenAI 商业化激进策略与安全/伦理派系的又一次碰撞。

items.title: TikTok 在美国推出基于精准位置的“本地流”
items.contentSnippet: TikTok's new Local Feed will show you nearby shopping, dining, events, news, and more.
items.whyItMatters: 平台动态：TikTok 杀入本地生活，直接对标 Yelp/Google Maps。

items.title: Integrate 融资 1700 万美元：革新国防项目管理
items.contentSnippet: The round was led by FPV Ventures co-founder and managing partner Wesley Chan.
items.whyItMatters: 行业融资：国防科技（Defense Tech）持续升温，垂直 SaaS 机会。

items.title: Complyance 融资 2000 万美元：AI 原生合规管理
items.contentSnippet: Complyance raised a $20 million Series A led by GV for its AI-native compliance platform.
items.whyItMatters: AI 落地：合规/法务是 LLM 最好的落地场景之一。

items.title: 人形机器人公司 Apptronik 估值超 50 亿美元，融资近 10 亿
items.contentSnippet: Apptronik has sold another $520 million in a Series A extension to existing and new investors like Google and Mercedes-Benz.
items.whyItMatters: 硬科技：具身智能资本狂欢，估值泡沫与落地预期的博弈。

items.title: Meridian 融资 1700 万美元：重塑“Agentic 表格”
items.contentSnippet: A new company called Meridian.AI has emerged from stealth with an IDE-based approach to agentic financial modeling.
items.whyItMatters: 产品形态：Excel/Spreadsheet 是 Agent 改造的重点战场。

items.title: 三星将于 2 月 25 日举办 Galaxy S26 发布会
items.contentSnippet: Samsung is going to launch S26 lineup just before Mobile World Congress (MWC).
items.whyItMatters: 消费电子：MWC 前夕的安卓旗舰对决。

items.title: 随着联合创始人离职和 IPO 临近，马斯克转而谈论登月
items.contentSnippet: According to The New York Times, which reports that it heard the meeting, Musk told employees that xAI needs a lunar manufacturing facility...
items.whyItMatters: 马斯克时刻：在 xAI 动荡期抛出宏大愿景，典型的注意力转移操作。

items.title: xAI 创始团队几乎走了一半
items.contentSnippet: Whatever the cause of the departures, the cumulative impact is alarming...
items.whyItMatters: 人才流动：顶尖 AI 实验室的人才流失加剧，竞争格局生变。

items.title: 亚马逊或推媒体内容交易平台，供 AI 公司训练
items.contentSnippet: A new report claims the e-commerce giant is looking to create a pipeline of licensable content between media publishers and AI companies.
items.whyItMatters: 数据经济：版权内容开始定价交易，数据清洗/交易平台成新赛道。
